title: RESERVED Miniature fruit set for dollhouse in 1:12 scale | option 3
description: A bright and detailed miniature fruit scene in 1:12 scale — entirely handcrafted. Every fruit, bowl, and jar was sculpted and painted by me. All items are glued to the base. This tiny board is filled with realistic fruits: grapes, apples, pears, pomegranate, strawberries, blueberries, cherries, apricot, orange, and watermelon — all presented in miniature ceramic dishes. It looks as if you’ve caught a moment of abundance in miniature form. Perfect for collectors, dollhouse de…
